sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NO ,SETT_AGENCY ,SETT_ACC_TYPE ,STATUS ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 ,RESERVED4 ,RESERVED5 ,SETT_AGENCY_NAME ,DEDUCTION_TYPE FROM MER_ACCOUNT WHERE 1=1 AND MER_ACCOUNT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED4) Like '%'||(#reserved4:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED5) Like '%'||(#reserved5:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_agency_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEDUCTION_TYPE) =#deduction_type#
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_ACCOUNT WHERE 1=1 AND MER_ACCOUNT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED4) Like '%'||(#reserved4:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED5) Like '%'||(#reserved5:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_agency_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEDUCTION_TYPE) =#deduction_type#
